website_summaries.verdict: Merrell’s Primer Canvas is sturdy enough to face the daily hustle and bustle of one’s routine rain or shine. Featuring Merrell’s M-Select™ GRIP outsole ensures highly slip-resistant stability that aids in securing one’s feet in any element.Moreover, the Kinetic Fit™ Base insole provides intuitive support that contours one’s feet while keeping it free from the unwanted foul odor.
pros: A good number of users share their satisfaction with Merrell’s Primer Canvas for the all-around style and comfort it provides
The majority of the shoe buyers find the construction of the shoe durable
Several wearers express excitement on how the no-frills design fits their casual lifestyle
Numerous buyers find that the color selection allows for versatile styling
Most reviews mention that the Primer Canvas shoes are lightweight
This casual sneaker is good for city walking, according to some reviewers
cons: Some shoe wearers find the insoles on the low-top Merrell Primer Canvas pretty thin
A few users share they find it lacks some ample arch support
According to a couple of purchasers, they find the soles fall short on support

customer_reviews.title: Boulder is brown not dark grey
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Boulder color. In the picture they are dark grey. These shoes are absolutely brown. The box says Boulder and has a picture of a brown shoe. Would’ve never ordered had I known they were not even the close to the same color as the one in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Best canvas style shoe?
customer_reviews.text: Lots of extra length in the toe space, but that's not necessarily a bad thing. More comfortable with better support and traction than similar Vans and Converse shoes. Also appear to be more durable and better made than other canvas shoes I've worn.
customer_reviews.author: turbojeffro

customer_reviews.title: Full size larger...
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, these shoes run a full size larger than what I normally wear. I like the shoes themselves. Will try on a 3rd pair in hopes they fit.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I'm always a size 10 for almost all shoes but these are definitely too large. I have a solid inch+ gap from the my toe to the front of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: McHale Sterba

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down, still a quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size 14 which were to long. They are 32cm, width was good on my wide feet. I'm returning to order a size down. I would recommend the same
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like them but...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend like these and says their comfortable but the grey color I thought I was ordering is more like a tan color. Definitely wanted the grey...
customer_reviews.author: KarCla

customer_reviews.title: OK SHOE
customer_reviews.text: They’re an OK shoe just to knock around home in but they seem to run about a 1/2 size too large so I would suggest ordering a 1/2 shorter.
customer_reviews.author: ENTITLED2OPINION

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. A nice lightweight canvas sneaker. Outsole nice durometer gum rubber. Plenty of support. Not super wide or padded like a skate shoe. Worn about a month and they have no flaws or defects. I feel they are well made and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: McHahne

customer_reviews.title: What size????
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 14 my usual size and found that these are way too big, about 1” in front customer of my toes! Possible size mismark so my nephew wears 15’s so he will get these!
customer_reviews.author: Hemi Harry

customer_reviews.title: Clearly used shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are clearly worn! Grass and mud on them! What kind of business sells something that is clearly used and has some fading on it. They didnt even bother to clean them! I'm furious. I'd better get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazeon

product_meta.title: Merrell mens J000379-09.5 Primer Canvas
feature_bullets: Canvas upper traditional lace closure Kinetic Fit Base removable contoured insole for flexible support Lightweight EVA midsole with rubber outsole
